name: Blazing
desc: An active flame that will scorch any that draw too near.
effect: The first time a creature enters a Blazing _Position_ on a Turn or ends a _Phase_ in it they take 2 _Fire_ Damage. If they are in the _Position_ at the end of the _Round_ they gain _Alight_ [4 _Reflex_].
interactions: Water Terrain: Reduce the _Watersource_ value by 1, remove Blazing, then make this space _Veiled_.

name: Overgrown
desc: Thick grass, vines, or other growths cover this arena, making movement far more difficult.
effect: This _Arena_ is _Rough_. All Size 1 or less creatures have _Soft Cover_. A creature may Attack the Arena; if they deal at least 3 _Slash_ Damage they may create a piece of _Terrain_ that does not have Overgrown. Any effects that Targets the whole Arena and does at least 8 _Slash_ Damage removes Overgrown.

name: Cliff
desc: This arena is a sheer cliff, difficult to climb with few handholds.
effect: It costs an additional _Movement_ to enter or leave this _Arena_. This cost is increased again if a creature does not have two _Free Hands_ to climb or similar. Any creature in this _Arena_ has _Disadvantage_ on all rolls, and rolls against them have _Advantage_ as they attempt to cling to the cliff. Creatures with the _Climber_ trait or similar ignore all these penalties.

name: Churning Water
desc: Water that is choppy and covered in tumultuous waves.
effect: The _Position_ where this _Terrain_ is costs an additional _Movement_ to enter or leave.
special: If there is not a _Watersource_ _Terrain_ effect at the same location as this, end this effect.

name: Gusting
desc: A powerful gust that lasts only a short while.
effect: When this Terrain is applied, remove any [_Cloud_] _Terrain_. Non-Melee Attacks against a creature in this _Arena_ or that pass through or originate from this _Arena_ automatically decrease their Rank by 1.

name: Running Water
desc: Terrain that represents a slow-moving body of water.
effect: None; this may only be applied to Paths.

name: Toxic Gas
desc: Thick toxic gas that chokes the air.
effect: All creatures at this Position see creatures not at this Position as Obscured, and vice-versa. Additionally, the first time a creature enters a Toxic Gas _Position_ on a Turn or ends a _Phase_ in it they gain 3 _Block_. If they are in the _Position_ at the end of the _Round_ they gain _Poisoned_ [4 _Grit_].
interactions: Fire Damage and Terrain: Remove Toxic Gas. Deal 4 [_Fire_] Damage to all creatures present at the Toxic Gas' location.

name: Uneven Earth
desc: Ground full of unsure footing and low features that makes traveling through it difficult.
effect: The _Position_ where this _Terrain_ is costs an additional _Movement_ to enter or leave. Additionally, all creatures on this _Terrain_ take a -1 _Penalty_ to _Reflex_.

name: Veiled
desc: Terrain filled with dust, smoke, mist, or some other obscuring agent.
effect: All creatures at this _Position_ see creatures not at this _Position_ as _Obscured_, and vice-versa.

name: Wet
desc: Terrain drenched in water that limits a stable footing.
effect: All creatures on this _Terrain_ take a -1 _Penalty_ to _Negate_ _Prone_ and _Forced Movement_.
